channel.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #48 [10/5 - 10/12] (Winner Announced)
channel.description:
<big> **====> ‚ì£—èùìê·∂ú“ú œÉùñã ùê≠‚íΩ·∫∏ ÔΩó—î‚Ç¨–∫** </big>
**‚ì¶hat happens?**
> * Each week a new topic (like this one) is posted in the #contests category. > * If you want your track considered for track of the week, just post a link to your track below, before the due date listed at the bottom of this topic. > * The winner will be announced here at the end of the week.
**‚ì°ules:**
> 1. Track must be made by the submitter, using Auxy. > 2. There are no set themes. Any genre. Any tempo. Any automations. > 3. Tracks must be 60-seconds or longer. > 4. Tracks submitted must premiere the week of the TotW posted. > 5. One entry per person, per week. > 6. No collabs or remixes. > 7. You can edit your post during the week if you make updates to your submission. > 8. External samples can be used for individual instruments or vocals only > ie: not sections of sampled music or drum loops. > 9. Project files won‚Äôt be considered - **judges reserve the right to see project files if the legitimacy of the track is in question!** > 10. Late entries won‚Äôt be considered. Enter in the next week instead. > 11. Please also create a thread for your track under #tracks, like usual, if you wish.
**‚ìôudging:** One winner is chosen each week, or possibly a draw. Judging will be totally subjective. Please don‚Äôt ask why your track didn‚Äôt win. The judges alternate between: -
* cursed * blakkaz * AzureOnyx * MrSerpent * Mr_Mooo * zhandermusic * Peregrihn * Dadmother * HexxOfficial * Goxenar
Judge this week is: @MrSerpent
**‚ìürize**
* Winner gets a special :cd: icon next to their forum name. * Winner‚Äôs name is also listed in a [winner‚Äôs thread](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-track-of-the-week-winners/15961).
**PLEASE NOTE: If you change your title in profile settings from ‚Äúblank‚Äù to Regular, or vice versa, YOU WILL LOSE ALL CDS AND UNICORNS!**
![Auxy%20Track%20of%20the%20Week|350x350](upload://ia7OKbSnziVU4UHv8vbhMQqNOQx) <small>*Logo created by Arimyth</small>

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #48 [10/5 - 10/12] (Winner Announced)
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Not cancelled, as such.
It‚Äôs just that changes in the Mods team means that there‚Äôs no-one really set on ‚Äòrunning it‚Äô from that side any more.

(iammane previous handled it, but he‚Äôs stepping back from his role as Mod here.)

The community could arrange and run it itself, but it possibly/probably wouldn‚Äôt have the little pay-offs such as badges next to user names.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #48 [10/5 - 10/12] (Winner Announced)
item.dc:creator: YeahMarcYeah
item.description:
Wow! Thanks!

I‚Äôm honored, really.

I worked pretty tirelessly on this one and I‚Äôm glad I got to share with all of you talented folks

I‚Äôve never won TOTW. Is there anything I need to do?

Thanks again!

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #48 [10/5 - 10/12] (Winner Announced)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
So, @lemonboy 's track is missing. @BenVacca I hate to be this guy, but rule #4:

By default, this goes to @YeahMarcYeah - I‚Äôll say this though, normally no feedback or reasoning is provided here, but, I think stepping out of your comfort zone was a good choice here, I like what you‚Äôve done. It‚Äôs definitely not your usual style, and pushing the envelope worked out well. This definitely has future bass overtones, not my usual bag, but you approached it with a pop sensibility that makes it more accessible.

Sorry for the delay here, I have no idea where Serp is so I‚Äôm stepping in. I‚Äôll update the hall of fame shortly and dispense the disc.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #48 [10/5 - 10/12] (Winner Announced)
item.dc:creator: YeahMarcYeah
item.description:
Here‚Äôs my sub:

https://soundcloud.com/slowbydesign/my-new-jutsu?ref=clipboard&p=i&c=1

I really pushed myself to create something totally fresh and different on this one - and less of the ‚Äúchill/nostalgia‚Äù thing I normally do.

For me to create a new sound, I actually took inspiration from you guys here in the Auxy community. I listened to a bunch of yalls stuff, and put my own spin on it. I‚Äôm pretty happy with the way it turned out

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #48 [10/5 - 10/12] (Winner Announced)
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
====> ‚ì£—èùìê·∂ú“ú œÉùñã ùê≠‚íΩ·∫∏ ÔΩó—î‚Ç¨–∫

‚ì¶hat happens?

  • Each week a new topic (like this one) is posted in the #contests category.
  • If you want your track considered for track of the week, just post a link to your track below, before the due date listed at the bottom of this topic.
  • The winner will be announced here at the end of the week.

‚ì°ules:

  1. Track must be made by the submitter, using Auxy.
  2. There are no set themes. Any genre. Any tempo. Any automations.
  3. Tracks must be 60-seconds or longer.
  4. Tracks submitted must premiere the week of the TotW posted.
  5. One entry per person, per week.
  6. No collabs or remixes.
  7. You can edit your post during the week if you make updates to your submission.
  8. External samples can be used for individual instruments or vocals only
    ie: not sections of sampled music or drum loops.
  9. Project files won‚Äôt be considered - judges reserve the right to see project files if the legitimacy of the track is in question!
  10. Late entries won‚Äôt be considered. Enter in the next week instead.
  11. Please also create a thread for your track under #tracks, like usual, if you wish.

‚ìôudging:
One winner is chosen each week, or possibly a draw. Judging will be totally subjective. Please don‚Äôt ask why your track didn‚Äôt win. The judges alternate between: -

  • cursed
  • blakkaz
  • AzureOnyx
  • MrSerpent
  • Mr_Mooo
  • zhandermusic
  • Peregrihn
  • Dadmother
  • HexxOfficial
  • Goxenar

Judge this week is: @MrSerpent

‚ìürize

  • Winner gets a special icon next to their forum name.
  • Winner‚Äôs name is also listed in a winner‚Äôs thread.

PLEASE NOTE: If you change your title in profile settings from ‚Äúblank‚Äù to Regular, or vice versa, YOU WILL LOSE ALL CDS AND UNICORNS!


*Logo created by Arimyth

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #48 [10/5 - 10/12] (Winner Announced)
